PPI::Structure::Block(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation PPI::Structure::Block(3)

NAME

PPI::Structure::Block - Curly braces representing a code block

SYNOPSIS

  sub foo { ... }
  
  grep { ... } @list;
  
  if ( condition ) {
      ...
  }
  
  LABEL: {
      ...
  }

INHERITANCE

  PPI::Structure::Block
  isa PPI::Structure
      isa PPI::Node
          isa PPI::Element

DESCRIPTION

"PPI::Structure::Block" is the class used for all curly braces that represent code blocks. This includes subroutines, compound statements and any other block braces.

METHODS

"PPI::Structure::Block" has no methods beyond those provided by the standard PPI::Structure, PPI::Node and PPI::Element methods.

SUPPORT

See the support section in the main module.
